[I]0-i ’m shaking in [my]0-i black [Doc Martens]89-doc martens as [I]0-i knock lightly on [Emerson]72-charlotte ’s front door . And that ’s all that matters to [me]0-i . As if [he]26-beau can read [my]0-i mind , [he]26-beau does exactly what [I]0-i want [him]26-beau to do .
